input_data.title: Goliath
input_data.overview: Once a powerful lawyer, Billy McBride is now burned out and washed up, spending more time in a bar than a courtroom. When he reluctantly agrees to pursue a wrongful death lawsuit against the biggest client of Cooperman & McBride, the massive law firm he helped create, Billy and his ragtag team uncover a vast and deadly conspiracy, pitting them all in a life or death trial against the ultimate Goliath.

response.analytical_summary: Goliath is a legal drama series centered on a disgraced lawyer attempting to redeem himself while confronting a powerful and corrupt legal institution. The show blends courtroom procedural elements with a character-driven narrative exploring themes of justice, morality, and personal redemption. It offers a suspenseful and morally complex viewing experience, examining the dark side of the legal system and the toll it takes on those involved. The series is characterized by its gritty realism and strong performances, creating a compelling and often unsettling portrayal of power and its consequences.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Billy McBride, a former star lawyer at Cooperman & McBride, now a washed-up alcoholic haunted by a past case. He's reluctantly drawn back into the legal arena when a seemingly straightforward wrongful death lawsuit against his former firm is presented. As Billy and his team investigate, they uncover a vast conspiracy involving Cooperman & McBride's biggest client, a powerful pharmaceutical company. The case escalates, revealing a pattern of corporate malfeasance and cover-ups that reach the highest levels of the legal and political establishment. Billy faces intense pressure and threats as he attempts to expose the truth, battling not only the formidable legal resources of his former colleagues but also the personal demons that have plagued him. The investigation reveals deep-seated betrayals and long-held secrets, forcing Billy to confront his own past mistakes and the systemic corruption that allowed them to occur. The series culminates in a high-stakes trial where Billy must use all his skills and cunning to overcome the odds and bring the guilty to justice, ultimately seeking a measure of personal redemption.
response.keyword_sentence: Goliath is a dark and suspenseful legal drama series exploring themes of corruption and redemption as a disgraced lawyer confronts a powerful law firm and uncovers a vast conspiracy in modern-day Los Angeles.
